DOC.brief_summary: Serial EGC measurements in premature infants attempting to correlate EGC measurements with signs of feeding intolerance and response to metoclopramide therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Electrogastrography (EGC) in Premature Infants With Feeding Intolerance
DOC.criteria: Inclusion: Premature infants. Absence of 1) infection, 2) congenital anomalies, 3) growth retardation
